full_threads.body: +30mins to Harvest
@ricaR +30mins Thanks!

Hi Kasia,

Unfortunately, PDF form fields are not supported by the mobile browser.

However this can be done by:

  1. Download the file
  2. Click Open in "Open in Downloads"
  3. Press and Hold the PDF, Click "Quick Actions" then "Markup"
  4. Press the " ... " at the top.

Please see the attached

Hi Joel,

This was regarding the incident form Rica uploaded for me. I'm able to open and edit on the pc but when I download on a mobile device, I'm not able to edit the form just view.



Let me know if you need more details.

Kasia
